NeatGenomeBuilderAcyclic
INeatGenomeBuilder​<T>
public sealed
NeatGenomeBuilderAcyclic​<T>
where T : struct

For building instances of NeatGenome{T}. For use when evolving acyclic graphs only.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.

Functions
NeatGenomeBuilderAcyclic
public NeatGenomeBuilderAcyclic(
MetaNeatGenome<T> metaNeatGenome,
bool validateAcyclic
)

Construct with the given NEAT genome metadata.

If the caller can guarantee that calls to Create() will provide acyclic graphs only, then validateAcyclic can be set to false to avoid the cost of the cyclic graph check (which is relatively expensive to perform).

Parameters
metaNeatGenome
MetaNeatGenome<T>

NEAT genome metadata.

validateAcyclic
bool

Enable acyclic graph validation.
